mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report ( report_number, member_id, report_date, report_title, report_content, check_complate, sales_number ) VALUES ( null, #{member_id}, NOW(), #{report_title}, #{report_content}, 0, #{sales_number} )
INSERT INTO notice ( notice_number, notice_title, notice_date, notice_content, notice_count, member_id ) VALUES ( null, #{notice_title}, NOW(), #{notice_content}, #{notice_count}, #{member_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY NOTICE_NUMBER DESC ) A LIMIT #{startrow}, 10
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM report ORDER BY REPORT_NUMBER DESC ) A LIMIT #{startrow}, 10
